I've read some posts on this and I am having a problem where I use the
Java=
 Process and ProcessBuilder classes to launch Heritrix as if it
were launch=
ed by the command-line...but I get the same issue as:

http://tech.groups.y=
ahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/1272

...the crawl ends after only a=
 few crawled files with no obvious error.

The solution to that post was to=
 upgrade to version 1.2.0 or greater
and use the Heritrix Jar directly...is=
 this the recommended way? 

If I upgrade to the latest (2.0.0) will my Pro=
cess/ProcessBuilder
method work? Or will I need to include the Heritrix jar=
 and related
jars in my project and call it directly?

Any suggestions are =
welcome.

Thanks,

Tristen
